name: Cross Horde
overview: One of the first things that will catch your attention of this game is the evolution of your weapon. At first, you can only fire one arrow at once then when you start killing horde members (especially the white ones) they will give you speed, fast in shooting, triple shooting arrows, arrows to increase your stuff weapon and points. Beware of the red foes because they will constantly shoot at you. It is important that you have good aim, as you have limited arrows.
